# PaperPause

PaperPause is a library of high-quality, free printable coloring pages for kids and adults, organized by subject matter and artistic style.

## AI-friendly Markdown endpoints

These URLs serve clean, structured Markdown representations of our content, optimized for AI agents and answer engines to ingest.

### Home and Main Collections

- https://paperpause.app/index.md — Site index with all top-level collections

### Animals Collection

- https://paperpause.app/animals/index.md — All animals (aggregate)
- https://paperpause.app/animals/cats/index.md — Cats
- https://paperpause.app/animals/dogs/index.md — Dogs
- https://paperpause.app/animals/butterflies/index.md — Butterflies
- https://paperpause.app/animals/horses/index.md — Horses
- https://paperpause.app/animals/sharks/index.md — Sharks

### Taxonomies

- https://paperpause.app/tags/index.md — All content tags
- https://paperpause.app/categories/index.md — All categories

## XML Sitemaps (for search engines)

- https://paperpause.app/sitemap.xml — Main sitemap index
- https://paperpause.app/pages-sitemap.xml — Static pages sitemap

## How to Use

Each Markdown endpoint contains:

1. **Page/Section Header** — Title and description
2. **Metadata Block** — Structured fields: canonical HTML URL, style, audience, tags, publication date
3. **Asset Links** — Downloadable PDF and source image URLs
4. **Image Embedding** — Markdown image tag pointing to the coloring page
5. **Indexed Content** — For collection pages, lists of child items with links to their own Markdown endpoints

This structure allows AI agents to:
- Discover and understand our entire content hierarchy
- Extract rich metadata without parsing HTML
- Link directly to assets (PDFs, images)
- Maintain reference links to HTML versions for users

For questions or API requests, visit https://paperpause.app/contact/
